titles.title: Gun Lake Trust Land Reaffirmation Act
Gun Lake Trust Land Reaffirmation Act
Gun Lake Trust Land Reaffirmation Act
Gun Lake Trust Land Reaffirmation Act
Gun Lake Trust Land Reaffirmation Act
Gun Lake Trust Land Reaffirmation Act
A bill to reaffirm that certain land has been taken into trust for the benefit of the Match-E-Be-Nash-She-Wish Band of Pottawatami Indians, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Tester without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 432.

action.text: By Senator Tester from Committee on Indian Affairs filed written report. Report No. 113-194.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee Indian and Alaska Native Affairs.
Subcommittee Indian and Alaska Native Affairs Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 113-590.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 437.

action.text: Mr. Hastings (WA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1603.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 359 - 64 (Roll no. 503).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
9/26/2014--Public Law. Gun Lake Trust Land Reaffirmation Act - Ratifies and confirms the actions of the Secretary of the Interior in taking specified land into trust for the benefit of the Match-E-Be-Nash-She-Wish Band of Pottawatami Indians.
Reaffirms that land as trust land.
Prohibits an action relating to that land from being filed or maintained in a federal court.
